name: Mason & Strings (Patrick Merklee)
description:
Press Enter to Start!

Controls:

AD to move

Spacebar to jump

Q to use grapple hook (use the mouse to aim)

W to interact

E to play guitar

WS to move chord wheel

Left Arrow (I) to play C

Up Arrow (K) to play G

Right Arrow (M) to play D

Down Arrow (J) to play E-minor

Credits:

Jack Brubaker - art, story, music

Patrick Merklee - programming, level design

Thendral Prabu - programming

Jason Sekora - music
